name: Asteroids: Multiverse Edition
description:
Specially created for GMTK Game Jam 2022!

Asteroids: Multiverse Edition is a variation a game, which you could make as an official tutorial project in GMS2.

Multiverse Edition combines classic Asteroids-like gameplay with a big change: every 6 seconds you are teleported into different universe. With each teleportation, your ship can change its speed, maneuverability and even size. Asteroids are also changing, be on the lookout!

Controls: 

  • Left / Right to change direction
  • Up to accelerate
  • Space to shoot

Game was made in ≈6 hours, so it may not look very good and be a little buggy.

Used assets:

  • Kenney's Simple Space
  • Kevin Macleod's "Phantom From Space"
